name: My Museum Prologue: Treasure Hunter
description:
Do you like prologue ? Remember to wishlists full game:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1833710/My_Museum/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2052650/Sword__Shield_Simulator/



My Museum is an educational FPV simulator designed for renovation fans, expeditioners, management and history enthusiasts! You will find amazing renovation mechanics, improved economy, many puzzles and lots of historical facts! Great fun for the whole family!

In the game you step into the role of an owner, art lover, antiques restorer, traveler but also a businessman. Your first task will be to restore the museum you inherited from your grandfather, restore its glory and compete for the admiration of critics and visitors!

RENEW MUSEUM - before you renovate the museum, do a demolition job

──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────

RESTORE ARTEFACTS - get and restore artifacts in your professional studio, feel like a real restorer


──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────

EXPLORE UNKNOWN PLACES - Visit interesting places and get exhibits for the museum yourself
Piramid will be available in prologue version

Bunker will be available in full version

──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────

MAINTAIN THE BUILDING - clean and renovate the old museum, remember that a beautiful place requires constant work

──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────

ORGANIZE EXHIBITIONS - show what you have created and organized the best exhibitions

──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────

Restore your way to glory!

- breathe new life into an old museum building
- explore unknow places and aquire the artifacts
- collect old and damaged artefacts
- explor remote world corners and find exhibits
- solve the riddles
- restore antiques and make them regain their shine
- create the best exhibition
- organise auctions and earn
- become the largest art institution

This groundbreaking, cross genre title lets you become a STAR in the Museum industry.
You will be facing tough managerial decisions, financial struggles and a traps lurking for you during the expeditions
Do you think you have what it takes to create the best exhibition in the country?
Are you ready to get dirty, to find the most unique artefact on the market?
Will you make HISTORY?
